text.textblock: The Port Authority of New York & New Jersey/Contship Containerlines, Inc. Incentive Agreement.
The Port Authority of New York & New Jersey (``Port'').

The Agreement provides for the Port to pay Contship a container incentive of $20.00 for each import container and $30.00 for each export container loaded or unloaded from a vessel at the Port's marine terminals during calendar year 1994, provided each container is shipped by rail to or from points more than 260 miles from the Port.
The Port Authority of New York & New Jersey/Croatia Line Incentive Agreement.

The Port Authority of New York & New Jersey/Orient Overseas Container Lines USA Inc. Incentive Agreement.
The Port Authority of New York & New Jersey (``Port'').
Orient Overseas Container Lines USA Inc. (``OOCL'').

The Agreement provides for the Port to pay OOCL a container incentive of $20.00 for each import container and $30.00 for each export container loaded or unloaded from a vessel at the Port's marine terminals during calendar year 1994, provided each container is shipped by rail to or from points more than 260 miles from the Port.
